org.joo.steak.framework

Interface StateManager

  • All Superinterfaces:
    StateChangedListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractStateManager, DefaultStateManager

    public interface StateManager
extends StateChangedListener
    The main class of state engine, it loads the configuration and handles state changing logic.
    Author:
    griever

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface org.joo.steak.framework.event.StateChangedListener

        onStateChanged

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        void initialize(StateContext stateContext,
              StateEngineConfiguration configuration,
              StateEngineLoader loader)
        Initialize the state engine. Implementation should make sure that this method can only be called once for each instance of StateManager. The loader may be used to load the actual states and transitions from configuration. Implementation should provide a default loader if null is passed.
        Parameters:
        stateContext - the state context
        configuration - the state engine configuration
        loader - the state engine loader

      • run

        void run()
        Run the state engine. This will start from initial state, change state accordingly until final state is reached (i.e, no next state from it)

      • getStateContext

        StateContext getStateContext()
        Get the state context
        Returns:
        the state context
